DocAttribute.Name: Benchmark
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration that identifies the type of benchmark data.

DocAttribute.Name: ValueSource
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Reference source for data values.
If _DataValue_ refers to an _IfcTable_, this attribute identifies the relevent column identified by _IfcTableColumn_._Identifier_.

DocAttribute.Name: DataValue
ReferencePath
DocAttribute.Documentation: Optional path to an attribute to be constrained on associated objects. If provided, the metric may be validated by resolving the path to the current value on associated object(s), and comparing such value with _DataValue_ according to the _Benchmark_.
